title: Calories in Caesar Salad
meta_description: Discover calories in caesar salad for a standard serving, including macros like protein, fat, carbs, plus tweaks and FAQs for better choices.
assumptions: Standard side serving (~200 g) with romaine lettuce, croutons, parmesan cheese, and creamy dressing; no added protein like chicken.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, portion size, dressing amount, and ingredients; restaurant versions may differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical Caesar salad serving provides ~360 kcal, mostly from dressing and croutons.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a Caesar salad?
faqs.a: About 360 kcal for a standard 200 g serving with dressing.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Caesar salad?
faqs.a: Around 30 g total fat per serving, mainly from the creamy dressing.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in Caesar salad?
faqs.a: Use dressing sparingly, omit croutons, or opt for a lighter vinaigrette instead.

faqs.q: Does Caesar salad have much protein?
faqs.a: Base version has ~10 g; adding chicken boosts it to 30+ g per serving.
